items.stem: What is the main mechanism of physiologic jaundice in neonates?
items.explanation: Physiologic neonatal jaundice results from immaturity of hepatic conjugation enzymes (UDP-glucuronyl transferase).

items.stem: A term newborn with yellowing at 24 hours: what must be considered?
items.explanation: Any early jaundice should raise concerns for pathologic causes; but mild physiologic jaundice can be normal. Consider all possibilities.
